review: Terrible customer service.  Easy to set up, but it did not function as intended.  I have a Roku 2 box on another TV and it works fine.  Got online to live chat and spent forever in a queue of 69 people.  Finally got a rep who clearly was troubleshooting multiple customers simultaneously.  She could not make it work but did certainly try.  She gave me a case # and said Roku would replace my defective unit  Heard nothing.  Wrote to Roku customer service twice with order info from Amazon and included the case # and have had ZERO response from Roku.  Am returning this device to Amazon.  Saw a comment here that Roku should take lessons from Amazon in customer service, and I agree wholeheartedly.  I no longer want this replaced.  I want a refund.
author: gizzie5
